post:
Have you been missing our good old EU plans? I've got some excellent news for you, after almost a year our NL location finally has room for some new customers.

[MICRO-64 $3.99/year 64MB RAM 1.5GB SSD 100GB Bandwidth on GigE](https://bandwagonhost.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=19)

[MICRO-96 $4.99/year 96MB RAM 2.0GB SSD 200GB Bandwidth on GigE](https://bandwagonhost.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=20)

[MICRO-128 $5.99/year 128MB RAM 3.0GB SSD 300GB Bandwidth on GigE](https://bandwagonhost.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=21)

[Our famous 5G plan: $9.99/year 512MB RAM 5.0GB SSD 500GB Bandwidth on GigE](https://bandwagonhost.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=22)

Locations: Jacksonville, Florida (GoRack), Los Angeles, California (QuadraNET), Amsterdam, Netherlands (Serverius).

Platform: OpenVZ, control panel: KiwiVM

Existing customers can migrate to EU right from the KiwiVM panel, without data loss.
